node.title: What you need to know about the COVID lockdown rules in Katherine and Greater Darwin
node.alt: A country town main street, with a four-wheel drive in the foreground and palm trees.
node.description: Katherine has entered a three-day hard lockdown, andÂ Greater Darwin has entered its first three-day lockout. Here's what you need to know.
node.content:
["Katherine has entered a three-day hard lockdown, and\u00a0Greater Darwin has entered its first\u00a0three-day lockout, after the Northern Territory recorded its first case of community COVID-19 transmission.", "An unvaccinated man in his 20s was confirmed as COVID-positive\u00a0on Thursday evening.", "The snap lockdown, which started today, is due to lift at midnight on Sunday.", "During the announcement last night, NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner said health authorities\u00a0do not know the source of the infection.", "The lockdown rules are different in Katherine and Greater Darwin.\u00a0", "", "
NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner announced the lockdown rules at a late press conference last night.(ABC News: Xavier Martin)
", "
If you're in Katherine
", "From today, Katherine will enter a hard lockdown for 72 hours, ending at midnight on Sunday.\u00a0", "The lockdown applies to everyone in Katherine, regardless of vaccination status.\u00a0", "If you live in Katherine, including Tindal, you must stay home except for one of the five reasons.", "They are:", "Like in other lockdowns, you're allowed to leave your home in the case of any kind of emergency or danger, including to escape domestic violence.", "You must wear a mask at all times for\u00a0these activities.\u00a0", "There will be checkpoints established outside of Katherine to control travel in and out of the area.", "People who live immediately outside this area will be able to travel into the lockdown areas for essential goods and services.", "Non-Territorians are permitted to leave the lockdown area only in order to leave the Territory. But otherwise you cannot leave the area or enter the area, without an essential reason.", "
If you're in Greater Darwin and you are fully vaccinated
", "For the first time, there are different rules for vaccinated and unvaccinated people.", "If you are fully vaccinated, you are\u00a0free to live your life as normal, except for the requirement to wear a mask.", "You are\u00a0also required to show your vaccination certificate to a staff member whenever you go into a business.", "At the moment\u00a0you can find your vaccination certificate through the MyGov website or app.", "Last night, Mr\u00a0Gunner said the local app for vaccination certificate \"is only about a week away\".", "One rule is the same for both vaccinated and unvaccinated people in Greater Darwin \u2014 everyone is required to stay in the region for the next 72 hours.", "", "
Vaccinated\u00a0people in Greater Darwin must continue checking in at venues using\u00a0QR codes.(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "
Face mask rules in Darwin for fully vaccinated people
", "Vaccinated people are required to wear a face mask at all times when they are not able to physically distance \u2014 both indoors and outdoors.", "Masks must be worn when exercising, including at gyms.", "Masks must be worn at public indoor and outdoor venues, including cafes, bars and restaurants.", "People are permitted to remove them when seated.", "Masks must be worn at shops and offices. They can be removed when seated.", "
In Darwin and unvaccinated, or only had a single dose?
", "For unvaccinated people, it's a lockdown.", "Unless you're an essential worker, you're only allowed to leave home for the usual five reasons.", "Unvaccinated kids are allowed to go to school, child care and sport.\u00a0", "Mr\u00a0Gunner said he didn't want to punish kids if their parents aren't letting them get vaccinated, or they haven't gotten to it yet, but said they are at risk and should get vaccinated.", "
How does this work for businesses?
", "Fully vaccinated workers will be going to work as normal and unvaccinated essential workers can go to work.", "For the first time, businesses will be required to check their customers' and visitors' vaccination status.", "With the ability to link the vaccination certificates to the Territory Check In app still apparently a week away, Mr\u00a0Gunner said the next few days will require \"a hell of a lot of cooperation\" from customers visiting businesses.", "He said the Chief Health Officer's direction required\u00a0businesses to check vaccination certificates and customers to show them.", "But he said businesses \"won't be in trouble\" if customers can't or won't provide vaccination proof at this point.", "\"If you are a business owner or an employee that is asking someone in your workplace to show proof of vaccination, and they cannot or will not show you, you won't be in trouble. They will be in trouble.\"", "He said police will be monitoring compliance and told businesses to call them if they have any trouble.", "
Where are the exposure sites?
", "Five exposure sites have been identified so far. They are:", "Mr Gunner said anyone who had been to an exposure site at the relevant times was required to isolate immediately, book a COVID-19 test and remain in isolation until they received further advice."]
